resources.string: Use Mi Band to set, track and follow your health and fitness data day and night.

Tap Open WeChat, then go to Scan QR code and tap Album to select the saved QR code.
Use your Mi Account to set, track, and follow your health and fitness data.

Firmware is the software installed on your Mi Band that allows it to talk to your device.
"Updates can improve Mi Band performance and may provide support for new features."
"Make sure Mi Band battery has 10% or more charge remaining."
Why do I need to update firmware?
Mi Band battery must be above 10% before it can be updated.
"Couldn't update Mi Band. Some features may not work properly."
Keep your Mi Band near your device while updating
Unable to analyse body below 100cm tall
Make sure Mi Band is close to your device throughout the entire pairing process.
"Make sure Mi Band is charged and hasn't run out of power."
Restart Bluetooth by turning it off and then on again in Settings.

Merge entries that are recorded less than 30 seconds apart
Body Mass Index (BMI) is a measurement of body fat based on height and weight that applies to adult men and women.
BMI is a measure of body fat based on height and weight. The physical distribution of fat varies widely among different body types.
"Your scale won't be able to record your weight data."
Weight scales have been paired, weight unit set on scales will be used. Open the battery cover located on the back panel to reset or adjust the weight unit.
Wait until the LED notification light blinks before stepping on the scale.
